description: Google has announced that multi-factor authentication (MFA) will be mandatory on all Cloud accounts by the end of 2025 to enhance security. [...]
title: Google Cloud to make MFA mandatory by the end of 2025

description: Interpol announced it arrested 41 individuals and taken down 1,037 servers and infrastructure running on 22,000 IP addresses facilitating cybercrime in an international law enforcement action titled Operation Synergia II. [...]
title: Interpol disrupts cybercrime activity on 22,000 IP addresses, arrests 41

description: The U.S. Cybersecurity & Infrastructure Security Agency is warning about last-minute influence operations conducted by Iranian and Russian actors to undermine the public trust in the integrity and fairness of the upcoming presidential election. [...]
title: US warns of last-minute Iranian and Russian election influence ops

description: Canadian authorities have arrested a man suspected of having stolen the data of hundreds of millions after targeting over 165 organizations, all of them customers of cloud storage company Snowflake. [...]
title: Suspect behind Snowflake data-theft attacks arrested in Canada

description: Google fixed two actively exploited Android zero-day flaws as part of its November security updates, addressing a total of 51 vulnerabilities. [...]
title: Google fixes two Android zero-days used in targeted attacks
